CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 看；寻找；与…外表相似；看似；显得；注意；面向；检查；查看；预料；期待；浏览；研究；考虑；（用于唤起他人注意）瞧
看；瞧；外观；样子；（尤指吸引人的）相貌；容貌；面貌；神情；表情；眼神；脸色；风格；时尚；审视；检查；调查；一瞥；视线；景象
（常为不悦时唤起他人注意）喂；听着；听我说

synonym.mean: 看；期待；注意；面向；看上去像

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 检查员；观看者；美人（口语）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，多用复数，可与appearance换用，但较口语化。
书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。
侧重以客观的态度进行观察。
指用眼睛跟随某物，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。

word_group.brief_definition: 回顾过去, 追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻
瞧不起, 轻视, 俯视
调查, 研究；审视, 看

list.abstract: 看，望，瞪，显示；注视；显得这里look是表感官的系动词（相当于系动词be),这类词叫做半系动词。半系动词后可用名词、不定式、分词和形容词等作表语，这类词有：1.表感观的系动词：look,sound,taste,smell,feel（这些词用形容词作表语）2.表似乎的系动词seem,appear3.表变化的系动词：become,get,turn,grow,make,come,go,fall,run4.表依旧的系动词：remain,keep,stay,continue,stand,rest,lie,hold5.可带名词作表语的系动词：become,make,look,sound,fall,prove,remain,turn（该词后接的单数名词前多不用冠词。
look，成立于1951年，位于法国讷韦尔，创始人为Jean Beyl，是一家从事自行车行业的企业。 根据官网显示截至2023年3月，产品有875麦迪逊RS，AL 464，895 维特斯等；经营范围包括生产球囊、高端赛车车架和组件等。

yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看。这是什么？
你看这个方向盘。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Look, he's closing his eyes. Look, he's opening his eyes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看，他闭上眼睛了。看，他张开眼睛了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Look everybody, look at my new dollhouse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看，我的新娃娃屋。
我看起来很胖吗？不会啊。

yingyinNormal.en: If you want to look for a house, that's okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗？如果你们只是想看看房子，没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey look, look, Phoebe's talking to, Cute Coffeehouse Guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看，菲比在跟咖啡厅帅哥说话。
回放。看火星车2号。
我现在看起来像是火星人。
看，真的行！我们成功了！
我看不出来什么。
你看起来挺高兴！还湿透了！
瑞秋，你别看什么？
你看 那个尖嘴老头害怕了。
我真起鸡皮疙瘩了，看。
哦，我以前看过他这表情。
霍华德，你看。那是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: It almost hurts to look at her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 光看她就觉得杀伤力好大啊。
眼睛，最后看你一眼。棒极了。
看，乔治！好多泥水坑！

exam_freq_info.chinese: (look on the bright side)持乐观态度

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有…相貌的；有…样子的
v. 忽视；忽略；看漏；俯视；眺望；监督；用邪恶的眼睛施魔法于；不理会；宽恕；宽容

word_family.mean: v. 看；看起来像；指望…做某事；指望…提供某物；寻找；期待；希望；查看；看待；检查

sense_info_list.en: try to find something or someone

examination_example.sentence: I decided to <highlight>look</highlight> for some fashion-related courses that included writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我决定找一些与时尚相关的课程，包括写作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> for cues about how others perceive you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 寻找别人如何看待你的线索。

examination_example.sentence: Those first few days should be spent <highlight>looking</highlight> for work, not <highlight>looking</highlight> to sign on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初的几天应该用来找工作，而不是签约。

examination_example.sentence: Each subject was then invited to <highlight>look</highlight> inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后邀请每个实验对象往里面看。

examination_example.sentence: Parents would be <highlight>looking</highlight> at their emails while the children would be making excited bids for their attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长们会看他们的电子邮件，而孩子们会兴奋地要求他们注意。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Looking</highlight> around, I despaired at the singular lack of imagination about girls' lives and interests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环顾四周，我对女孩们的生活和兴趣缺乏想象力感到失望。

examination_example.sentence: For someone moving from finance to advertising, maybe they want to <highlight>look</highlight> more "SoHo."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于从金融转向广告的人来说，也许他们想显得更“SoHo”。

examination_example.sentence: If the subjects quickly chose a falsely flattering image, they genuinely believed it was really how they <highlight>looked</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果研究对象很快选择了一个虚假的、奉承的形象，他们真的相信这确实是他们看起来的样子。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly, Britain <highlight>looks</highlight> to have fallen out with its favorite historical form.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然间，英国看起来已经和它最喜欢的历史形式失之交臂了。

examination_example.sentence: We can <highlight>look</highlight> at failure as the incredible learning experience that it often is.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以把失败看作是一次不可思议的学习经历。

examination_example.sentence: But there is also a different way to <highlight>look</highlight> at the data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但也有一种不同的方式来看待数据。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> at your work environment like an anthropologist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像人类学家一样看待你的工作环境。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers <highlight>looked</highlight> at data that included measurements of lean muscle and abdominal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员研究了包括瘦肌肉和腹部测量的数据。

examination_example.sentence: In a 2014 study, for example, Malti <highlight>looked</highlight> at 244 children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在2014年的一项研究中，Malti研究了244名儿童。

examination_example.sentence: We need to <highlight>look</highlight> at the ways in which machines can augment human labor rather than replace it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要研究机器如何增加而不是取代人类劳动。

examination_example.sentence: The centre was simultaneously <highlight>looking</highlight> to a time when leading researchers could also be artists, writers and poets, and vice versa.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该中心同时也在期盼一个时代，领先的研究人员也可以是艺术家、作家和诗人，反之亦然。

examination_example.sentence: Are you <highlight>looking</highlight> to refresh your image or pivot it?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是指望刷新你的形象还是改变它？

examination_example.sentence: Along with the many folks <highlight>looking</highlight> to make a permanent home in the United States came those who had no intention to stay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伴随着许多指望在美国安家的人而来的是那些无意留下的人。

examination_example.sentence: Rats respond more to actions than to <highlight>looks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老鼠对行为的反应比对外表的反应大。

examination_example.sentence: They suggest beauty should not be defined by <highlight>looks</highlight> that end up impinging on health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为，美不应该被最终会影响健康的外表所定义。

examination_example.sentence: We need to <highlight>look</highlight> to the example of our children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要注意以我们的孩子为榜样。

examination_example.sentence: They hint that people should <highlight>look</highlight> to intangible qualities like character and intellect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们暗示人们应该注意像性格和智力这样的无形品质。

examination_example.sentence: Congress should <highlight>look</highlight> into doing so directly, by helping to finance PreCheck enrollment or to cut costs in other ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国会应该通过资助预检注册或以其他方式削减成本，直接对此进行调查。

examination_example.sentence: The school board <highlight>looks</highlight> into the matter and conducts public hearings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校董事会调查此事并举行公开听证会。

examination_example.sentence: How do the people you respect and <highlight>look</highlight> up to present themselves?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你尊敬和敬仰的人是如何表现自己的？

examination_example.sentence: Monarchs are kept as heads of state in Europe mostly to give voters more public figures to <highlight>look</highlight> up to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在欧洲，君主被保留为国家元首，主要是为了让选民有更多的公众人物来敬仰。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, they <highlight>look</highlight> after their wellbeing instinctively, and usually more effectively than we do as grownups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，他们会本能地照顾自己的健康，而且通常比我们成年人做的更有效。

examination_example.sentence: You might even be tempted to assume that humanity has little future to <highlight>look</highlight> forward to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你甚至可能会认为人类没有什么未来可期待。

examination_example.sentence: Even very young children tend to <highlight>look</highlight> down on the overweight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使很小的孩子也往往瞧不起超重的人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> up Homo sapiens in the "Red List" of threatened species of the IUCN, and you will read: Listed as Least Concern.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界自然保护联盟(IUCN)的濒危物种《红色名录》上查阅“智人”这一词条，你将会看到：被列为“零危”物种。

sense_info_list.zh: (look on the bright side)持乐观态度

examination_example.sentence: The jobless try to <highlight>look</highlight> on the bright side of the recession.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失业者试图对经济衰退持乐观态度。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Looking</highlight> back, he is struck that his parents could provide a comfortable life for their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回想起来，他对父母能给孩子提供舒适的生活感到震惊。

examination_example.sentence: It was not a becoming <highlight>look</highlight> for properly bred persons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这（露齿笑）不是有教养的人应有的表情。

word_usage.usage: 表示某人注意看他们眼睛所见的某物，可用look at或watch。一般来说，用look at表示看不动的东西，而watch表示注视活动或变化的事物。look后不直接跟宾语，必须跟at或其他介词。表示眼睛获得视觉图像而知道某物的存在，则用see。
look表示“与……外表相似；好像；仿佛”时，通常不用于进行时。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回顾过去；追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻
把视线从...离开；转眼不看；视线避开

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 忽视；忽略；看漏；俯视；眺望；监督；用邪恶的眼睛施魔法于；不理会；宽恕；宽容

word_family.mean: v. 看；看起来像；指望…做某事；指望…提供某物；寻找；期待；希望；查看；看待；检查

examination_example.sentence: One only has to <highlight>look</highlight> at the remarkable arts facilities at Britain's top private schools to comprehend this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要看看英国顶级私立学校卓越的艺术设施，就能明白这一点。

examination_example.sentence: They're the areas that you <highlight>look</highlight> at when you're talking to someone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你和别人交谈时，它们是你注视的区域。

examination_example.sentence: When I <highlight>look</highlight> in the mirror, I'm proud of who I am—even those "broken" parts that for so long seemed impossible to love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我照镜子的时候，我为我是谁而自豪——即使是那些长期以来似乎不可能被爱的“破碎的”部分。

examination_example.sentence: But according to recent research conducted in Australia, it <highlight>looks</highlight> like it's not the employees' fault, but the managers'.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但根据最近在澳大利亚进行的调查，这似乎不是员工的错，而是管理者的错。

examination_example.sentence: They might not have even reflected on what good management <highlight>looks</highlight> like and how it would influence their own management style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们甚至可能没有思考过什么是好的管理，以及它会如何影响他们自己的管理方式。

examination_example.sentence: Popular culture makes people want to <highlight>look</highlight> popular, and act and speak like popular people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流行文化使人们想要看起来受欢迎，行为和说话都像受欢迎的人。

sense_info_list.en: try to find something or someone

examination_example.sentence: He kept <highlight>looking</highlight> for the best place to stay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一直在寻找最好的住处。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of relaxing, I was <highlight>looking</highlight> for the best spot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起放松，我在寻找更好的地方。

examination_example.sentence: We keep <highlight>looking</highlight> over and return to the same options again and again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直在寻找，并一次又一次地回到相同的选项。

examination_example.sentence: Users probably range from climate-change researchers, to foresters <highlight>looking</highlight> for information on different grades of timber.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用户的范围涵盖从气候变化研究人员，到正在寻找有关不同等级木材信息的林务人员。

sense_info_list.en: a person's appearance, especially how attractive they are

examination_example.sentence: They do not argue with propositions, they argue with good <highlight>looks</highlight>, celebrities and commercials.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不会与主张争论，他们会与美貌、名人和商业广告争论。

examination_example.sentence: In part, we rely on <highlight>looks</highlight>, humans wide faces are associated with dominance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，我们依靠长相，认为有大宽脸的人都处于主导地位。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes we believe things because they make us <highlight>look</highlight> good to the people we care about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时我们相信一些事情，是因为它们使我们在我们关心的人面前看起来很好。

examination_example.sentence: They want to save face and avoid <highlight>looking</highlight> stupid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们想挽回面子，避免显得愚蠢。

word_usage.usage:
look forward to中的to是介词， 后面应该接V-ing，不能接动词不定式。
示例：我非常渴望见你。
误 I am looking forward to see you.
正 I am looking forward to seeing you.

look用作系动词表示“看起来”时，后面不跟副词，并且不用于进行体。
示例：他看上去很高兴。
误 He looks happily.
误 He is looking happy.
正 He looks happy.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 着重由总体产生的印象。
书面用词, 突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词, 多用复数, 可与 appearance 换用, 但较口语化。
指出于羡慕、感兴趣、关心或惊异而长时间目不转睛地看。
指匆匆地或粗略地一看, 侧重心不在焉地、匆忙地看一眼。
指用愤恨、凶狠或含敌意的眼光死死看着某人。
"一瞥", 是短暂而急促地看, 含有意地匆匆地看一眼, 现多用作名词。[注意]一般表示"看"的单词大多同 at 搭配构成短, 但 glimpse 却有 catch (have) a glimpse of 这一搭配。
侧重"看"的动作, 但并不一定能看见, 有时用来唤起别人的注意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 忽视；忽略；看漏；俯视；眺望；监督；用邪恶的眼睛施魔法于；不理会；宽恕；宽容

word_family.mean: v. 看；看起来像；指望…做某事；指望…提供某物；寻找；期待；希望；查看；看待；检查

examination_example.sentence: We then <highlight>looked</highlight> at high school students' stress responses to daily social difficulties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我们观察了高中生对日常社交困难的压力反应。

examination_example.sentence: I'm <highlight>looking</highlight> through my files now, and I see that the delivery was this morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我现在正在查看我的文件，我发现是今天早上送货的。

examination_example.sentence: "I <highlight>looked</highlight> at her and said "I missed my graduation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看着她说：“我错过了我的毕业典礼。”

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>looks</highlight> like you had a professional interior designer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看起来你有个专业的室内设计师。

examination_example.sentence: They are light brown and <highlight>look</highlight> kind of cheap.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们是浅棕色的，看着有点廉价。

examination_example.sentence: Does it <highlight>look</highlight> like something that might occur in nature?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它看起来像自然界中可能发生的事情吗？

sense_info_list.en: try to find something or someone

examination_example.sentence: Are you only <highlight>looking</highlight> for flights or a package holiday with everything included?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是只找航班还是包价度假？

examination_example.sentence: Our bike-riding lessons are so successful that we are urgently <highlight>looking</highlight> for more volunteers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的自行车课非常成功，所以我们正在急切地寻找更多的志愿者。

examination_example.sentence: "So people <highlight>looked</highlight> for ways to do with what they had. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: “所以人们想办法利用他们拥有的东西。”

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> around before deciding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在决定之前先四处看看。

examination_example.sentence: Many companies now <highlight>look</highlight> to these "ultimate professionals" to solve problems their full-time teams can't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多公司现在指望这些“终极专业人员”来解决他们全职团队无法解决的问题。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> around oneself for stimulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环顾四周寻找刺激。

word_usage.usage:
look forward to中的to是介词， 后面应该接V-ing，不能接动词不定式。
示例：我非常渴望见你。
误 I am looking forward to see you.
正 I am looking forward to seeing you.

look用作系动词表示“看起来”时，后面不跟副词，并且不用于进行体。
示例：他看上去很高兴。
误 He looks happily.
误 He is looking happy.
正 He looks happy.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指出于羡慕、感兴趣、关心或惊异而长时间目不转睛地看。
指匆匆地或粗略地一看，侧重心不在焉地、匆忙地看一眼。
指用愤恨、凶狠或含敌意的眼光死死看着某人。
"一瞥"，是短暂而急促地看，含有意地匆匆地看一眼，现多用作名词。[注意]一般表示"看"的单词大多同 at 搭配构成短语，但 glimpse 却有 catch (have) a glimpse of 这一搭配。
侧重"看"的动作，但并不一定能看见，有时用来唤起别人的注意。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回顾过去；追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 忽视；忽略；看漏；俯视；眺望；监督；用邪恶的眼睛施魔法于；不理会；宽恕；宽容

word_family.mean: v. 看；看起来像；指望…做某事；指望…提供某物；寻找；期待；希望；查看；看待；检查

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> at the table of contents, the preface, the chapter heading, etc.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看目录、前言、章节标题等。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> on the bright side!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 往好的方面看！

examination_example.sentence: I smelt the flowers, <highlight>looked</highlight> at the birds, and yeah, I picked many tree leaves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我闻了闻花，看了看鸟，是的，我还摘了很多树叶。

examination_example.sentence: Having said that, I did not know for a long time what I was <highlight>looking</highlight> for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 话虽如此，我很长一段时间都不知道自己在寻找什么。

examination_example.sentence: If you're looking for cleanliness and a modern hostel, <highlight>look</highlight> no further than Youth Station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你正在寻找一间干净又现代化的旅馆，只要看看青年旅社就可以了。

examination_example.sentence: Eventually, they found the piece of evidence they were <highlight>looking</highlight> for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最终，他们找到了一直在寻找的证据。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>look</highlight> close to a human, but not quite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们看起来很像人类，但并不完全像。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>look</highlight> like twins, but we are completely different.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们看起来像双胞胎，但我们完全不同。

examination_example.sentence: We'd come down in the morning to find they'd turned the room upside down, and left it <highlight>looking</highlight> like a zoo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们早上下来，发现他们把房间弄得乱七八糟，看起来像个动物园。

examination_example.sentence: Who will <highlight>look</highlight> after the children?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁来照看孩子们？

examination_example.sentence: Things quickly got very intense due to the huge amount of energy required to <highlight>look</highlight> after them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于照顾他们需要大量的精力，事情很快变得非常紧张。

examination_example.sentence: And secondly, let me ask you to please <highlight>look</highlight> after your money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二，请你保管好你的钱。

examination_example.sentence: If not, take another <highlight>look</highlight> at other methods you could try.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果没有，再看看你可以尝试的其他方法。

examination_example.sentence: After you've tried a new method for a week, take a <highlight>look</highlight> at your record.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你尝试一个新方法一周后，看看你的记录。

examination_example.sentence: One more <highlight>look</highlight> and he noticed flames shooting out from under the disabled vehicle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再看一眼，他就注意到火焰从那辆残障的车下面冒了出来。

examination_example.sentence: Nielsen always felt he should be doing comedy but his good <highlight>looks</highlight> and distinguished voice kept him busy in dramatic roles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Nielsen一直觉得他应该演喜剧，但他英俊的外表和出众的嗓音让他忙于演戏剧角色。

examination_example.sentence: They're humanlike in their <highlight>looks</highlight> and the way they sound, but that in itself is not being human.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的外表和声音都像人类，但这本身并不是人类。

examination_example.sentence: While riding his bike home on a cold night, he came across a sad-<highlight>looking</highlight> elderly woman wandering the streets by herself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个寒冷的夜晚，当他骑自行车回家时，他遇到了一位面容忧伤的老妇人独自在街上徘徊。

examination_example.sentence: All of us really <highlight>looked</highlight> forward to being part of their lives and watching them grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都很期待成为他们生活的一部分，看着他们成长。

examination_example.sentence: It was tiring work, but I <highlight>looked</highlight> forward to the pay, even though I wasn't sure how much it would amount to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一份累人的工作，但我期待着报酬，尽管我不确定它的总数。

examination_example.sentence: I've been <highlight>looking</highlight> forward to this training program for a long time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很长时间以来，我一直期待着这个培训项目。

examination_example.sentence: "Let's <highlight>look</highlight> directly into the issue of collapse," they say.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “让我们直接审视坍塌的问题，”他们说。

examination_example.sentence: As I dreamt bigger, I began <highlight>looking</highlight> into college courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我梦想更大时，我开始研究大学课程。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>look</highlight> into the case, Wang disguised (伪装) himself and joined the beggars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了调查这件事，王乔装打扮，加入了乞丐的行列。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> back and realize they would have loved to have gone home and enjoyed the sweetness of their family and friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回首往事，意识到他们本想回家，享受家人和朋友的甜蜜。

examination_example.sentence: I'm hands-on with them every day at the zoo, and I do <highlight>look</highlight> back very fondly on the time that we had them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在动物园里，我每天都与它们亲密无间，我确实非常怀念我们拥有它们的时光。

examination_example.sentence: And today, when I <highlight>look</highlight> back, I'm so happy because you never know where life will take you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，当我回首往事，我很高兴，因为你永远不知道生活会带你去哪里。

examination_example.sentence: As the twins <highlight>looked</highlight> around them in disappointment, their father appeared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当双胞胎失望地环顾四周时，他们的父亲出现了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> around the shops.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参观下商店。

examination_example.sentence: The woman <highlight>looked</highlight> over at the man.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人看了看那个男人。

examination_example.sentence: Heart in mouth, I reached the fence and <highlight>looked</highlight> over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我如饥似渴地走到篱笆前，向那边看去。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>look</highlight> up to great thinkers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们敬仰伟大的思想家。

examination_example.sentence: The woman's eye fell on the man's face, and she immediately <highlight>looked</highlight> down and adjusted her scarf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这名女子的目光落在了男子的脸上，她立即低下头，调整了一下围巾。

examination_example.sentence: Spend a few minutes <highlight>looking</highlight> through the book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花几分钟看完这本书。

word_usage.usage:
look为不及物动词，只强调“看”的动作，不强调是否看见。look at与感官动词see、hear、feel等用法相同，作宾语补足语的不定式不带to：
He looked at the machine work smoothly.
他看着那台机器正常地运转。
也可以接现在分词作补语：
They are looking at the rain coming down.
他们看着雨往下落。
我们虽然讲“watch TV”，但是通常用see来表示看戏、电影。see作“看见”讲，通常不用于进行时中，而是用“see+宾语+现在分词”代替动词的进行时：I see somebody coming.（不能说I'm seeing...）

exam_freq_info.chinese: 显得; 似乎; 看起来

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有…相貌的；有…样子的
v. 忽视；忽略；看漏；俯视；眺望；监督；用邪恶的眼睛施魔法于；不理会；宽恕；宽容

word_family.mean: v. 看；看起来像；指望…做某事；指望…提供某物；寻找；期待；希望；查看；看待；检查

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 回顾过去；追忆；遭遇挫折；中途受阻

examination_example.sentence: The teacher <highlight>looked</highlight> at me and smiled without a word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师看着我，一言不发地笑了。

examination_example.sentence: Could you just get out and have a <highlight>look</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能出去看看吗？

examination_example.sentence: Today people use modern machines to <highlight>look</highlight> at the sky.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，人们用现代机器看天空。

sense_info_list.en: try to find something or someone

examination_example.sentence: While he was <highlight>looking</highlight> for a parking space, he saw a goose (鹅) standing in the middle of the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他在找停车位的时候，他看见一只鹅站在路中间。

examination_example.sentence: Students spent hours and hours in the library, <highlight>looking</highlight> for information in the old books for homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们在图书馆里花了好几个小时，在旧书里找资料做作业。

examination_example.sentence: Tony is <highlight>looking</highlight> for his gloves．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托尼正在找他的手套。

sense_info_list.zh: 显得; 似乎; 看起来

examination_example.sentence: You should make yourself <highlight>look</highlight> clean and tidy, whatever you wear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论你穿什么，你都应该让自己看起来干净整洁。

examination_example.sentence: Judy is good-looking, but I think she <highlight>looks</highlight> much prettier with long hair than with short hair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 朱迪长得很好看，但我认为她留长发比留短发好看得多。

examination_example.sentence: Lingling, you <highlight>look</highlight> unhappy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玲玲，你看起来不开心。

examination_example.sentence: She could not <highlight>look</highlight> after Remy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她不能照顾Remy。

examination_example.sentence: They may help kids learn to <highlight>look</highlight> after their money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以帮助孩子学会照看他们的钱。

examination_example.sentence: Teenagers are old enough to <highlight>look</highlight> after themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青少年已经大到可以照顾自己了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Look</highlight> at your plan on the right and complete the conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看着你右边的计划，并完成对话。

examination_example.sentence: I thought otherwise but I might be wrong, let's <highlight>look</highlight> at the facts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不这么认为，但我可能错了，让我们看看事实。

sense_info_list.en: a person's appearance, especially how attractive they are

examination_example.sentence: their <highlight>looks</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的长相

examination_example.sentence: So the princesses in its newer movies don't just have good <highlight>looks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，新版电影中的公主们不仅仅是长得好看。

examination_example.sentence: I want to <highlight>look</highlight> up the word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想查这个字。

examination_example.sentence: We should <highlight>look</highlight> it up in a good idiom dictionary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该在一本好的成语词典中查阅它。

examination_example.sentence: Most boys in Jay's class <highlight>looked</highlight> up to him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杰伊班上的大多数男生都尊敬他。

examination_example.sentence: It's a celebrity's job to be a good role model because people usually <highlight>look</highlight> up to stars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 名人的工作就是做一个好榜样，因为人们通常都仰慕明星。

examination_example.sentence: I'm <highlight>looking</highlight> forward to meeting her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很期待见到她。

examination_example.sentence: I am <highlight>looking</highlight> to the day when my kids will come to know of their grandmothers through the dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我期待着有一天，我的孩子们会通过盘子来认识他们的祖母。

examination_example.sentence: The young artist really gave the ancient Chinese culture a new <highlight>look</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位年轻的艺术家确实给古老的中国文化带来了新的面貌。

word_usage.usage:
look是不及物动词，若表示“看某人或某物”要用look at。
如：She looked at me and smiled.
她看了看我，笑了。（牛津）

look forward to中的to是介词， 后面应该接V-ing，不能接动词不定式。
示例：我非常渴望见你。
误 I am looking forward to see you.
正 I am looking forward to seeing you.

look用作系动词表示“看起来”时，后面不跟副词，并且不用于进行体。
示例：他看上去很高兴。
误 He looks happily.
误 He is looking happy.
正 He looks happy.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation:
是不及物动词，强调“看”的动作，接宾语时，其后要加介词at。
例：Please look at the blackboard.
请看黑板。

强调“看”的结果，可直接加宾语。
例：I looked but saw nothing.
我看了，但是什么也没看到。
通常用来表达“看书/报/信/杂志”等。
意为“观看；注视”，强调观看运动着的事物或影像，如电视、比赛、表演等。
